vote.title: To honor and celebrate October 28th as Mauritania Day in the City of Columbus
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor and celebrate October 28th as Mauritania Day in the City of Columbus
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, immigrants, migrants, and refugees are the number one factor behind population growth in Columbus; and 
 
WHEREAS, approximately 8,000 Mauritanians are currently residing in the United States, about half of whom are living in Ohio; and
 
WHEREAS, the Mauritanian Network for Human Rights has and continues to not only support new Mauritanians but also connect local Mauritanians to their elected officials in Columbus; and 
 
WHEREAS, Columbus is a welcoming city and recognizes the positive economic and cultural impact of our current and new Mauritanian neighbors; and 
 
WHERE, it is an honor that so many in the Mauritanian community  have chosen to call Columbus home after seeking asylum and refuge from their country of origin; and 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does declare October 28th as Mauritania Day in the City of Columbus.
